website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling, high-quality kid's boot that is well made but tends to run small.
pros: Praised for its excellent warmth, outstanding quality, good fit, and vibrant color, this is a popular youth boot style
Wearers love its coziness and comfort
cons: The boot needs to be treated in order to withstand wet conditions, and a few say the sizing runs small

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart and no help from the seller!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product no stars but it is not an option. I usually have great luck with Bearpaw boots. Ordered these at the end of September in anticipation of winter. We had a very warm fall and these were worn just a handful of times before the sole separated from the boot. I contacted the seller to see if they would exchange and received a very curt/rude reply about it being past the 30 day return date. I have never had bad service with Amazon. This was absolutely the worst customer service ever. In my opinion “Tina” did not do her job! Makes me wonder if these are knock offs because Bearpaw is usually a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: CUTE BOOTS, GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 10 year old daughter. I immediately applied waterproofing to them to make them more Oregon friendly. Love the price I got for them online. Since I noticed several issues with other customer's with durability, I researched the product warranty and will utilize that if we run into any issues with the boots.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal Girl

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying my kids these boots for years. Always lasted a season or more. This year the boot does NOT fit properly. It’s too narrow on the bottom by the ankle and kept hurting my kids. It’s not the size issue , it’s something wrong with the stiching inside the boot. Watch out for this problem
customer_reviews.author: MARINA

customer_reviews.title: Wore through the side in only 1 week
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore these boots for less than a week, and one of the boots developed a large hole at the side where the boot upper joins the sole. The hole is by the inside toe edge of the boot, probably the two boots were rubbing together when she walks, but only lasting for a week is ridiculous. I think the way the boot upper is joined to the sole is badly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine D

customer_reviews.title: Held up well over the winter
customer_reviews.text: Good boot, held up well over the winter and hasn’t shown any wear. My eight year old isn’t exactly careful or mindful with shoes, so I can confidently say they held up to some abuse. In fact it seems to me like she aims for snowbanks and puddles, as I imagine all of the little savages do. As with any type of boot like this, I did give them a generous coat of suede rated sealant spray prior to use. I would recommend that regardless, though I’m not even sure how effective that stuff really is. I’m also not exactly sure what kind of arch support expectations one would have in a boot like this, but they seem very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of boots that have fallen apart. The first pair came apart within the 30 day return period, and were replaced. Now, after 6 weeks, the replacement pair has come apart. I’m waiting to hear from the seller, but I’m not holding my breath, based on other purchasers’ experience with this company. I have been buying various Bear Paw products for years with no problem until now. I am questioning their current manufacturing and QA policies.
customer_reviews.author: Kona4554

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in 5 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these before and been very happy with their longevity. However, this pair fell apart within 5 weeks of purchasing (THREE DAYS AFTER THE RETURN WINDOW CLOSED). The glue and stitching between the rubber sole and the boot itself came completely undone with just regular use from my typical 8 year old girl. So unhappy with this purchase. See my pictures for details. I will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Lynn Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fantastic, however, beware that they run at least a size smaller than normal. Remember to order a size larger than you would normally or you'll be returning them for a larger size like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Tween daughter continues to request this brand + style
customer_reviews.text: I had to send these back (without hassle as is always the case with Amazon) b/c I thought my daughter's recent growth spurt would be covered by jumping two sizes. I believe that was wishful thinking as it would have kept us in the less expensive "youth" sizing vs. the "women's" sizing I in fact had to resort to for her. Bearpaw makes a great product for much less ("youth" or "women's" sizing) than similar styled brands; so we will continue to shop them. This particular style is one we've purchased 3-4 times; and she's been a fan since she was a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Acarna

customer_reviews.title: Revolutionary boot that cuddles with your feet!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd pair of these shoes. Because of the fluff we order a size up on the 1st pair. This worked well b/c by the time the fluff wore down they still fit; 2 year wear before she out grew them. My daughter claims they are the most comfortable shoes she’s ever worn. That’s the reason for the most recent order of a black and brown pair. Highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: MONICA

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, low durability
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our daughter and she opened them in Christmas. Less than three months later they are completely unwearable. If you intend on wearing these outside more than a time or two I would suggest purchasing a different brand. I don’t know if our experience is unusual but we are disappointed to have to throw away something we bought so recently
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Bought two of my granddaughters a pair for Christmas. I have a pair. We find we usually have to get one size larger than usual for little girls sizes and 1/2 size larger for adult sizes. But the boots are warm, comfy and we will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable. But not sturdy enough for a 7 year old girl. After about 3 months of accasional wear it came apart. Won’t be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Iona Stuelp

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: This boot didn’t last my daughter 2 months. I’m very unhappy with this purchase. The sole, the liner and the boot all separated from each other. There is no way to glue or tape this back together to make it last through the winter, either. These boots were not worn hard and were taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mo.

customer_reviews.title: IM CRUSHED THESE WOULD HAVE BEEN THE PERFECT GIFT BUT THEY WERE TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: IM CRUSHED THESE WOULD HAVE BEEN THE PERFECT GIFT BUT THEY WERE TOO SMALL. I ORDERED A SIZE UP AND THEY STILL PINCHED AT THE TOE. RETURN TOOK FOREVER BUT I DID GET MY MONEY BACK. THESE BOOTS CAME IN A NICE BOX AND OF COURSE WERE BRAND NEW. I WOULD HAVE BOUGHT IN A LARGER SIZE IF AVALIABLE.
customer_reviews.author: LTG

customer_reviews.title: Love the Bear Paws
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for an 11-year-old as an affordable alternative to Uggs. At 11 their feet are always growing and she may not fit into the boots next season so don"t want to spent too much money. She loves them. They look great, are comfortable and warm. They are sturdy too. Fit is a bit smaller than expected so I ordered one size larger than she may normally wear. Love the Bear Paws! Even when her feet stop growing she may always opt for Bear Paws instead of the more expensive boots!
customer_reviews.author: cebmay5

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots for my Daughter. Go up a Size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots for my 8 year old Daughter for Christmas and she loved it. My Daughter wanted "fuzzy boots just like Mommy" so I got her the chestnut colored ones and was impressed with the quality. I would definitely recommend going up a size. My Daughter is a size 2.5-3 and I got her the 4 and they were a tad big but I wouldn't have wanted to go down in size or they may have been snug.
customer_reviews.author: MBrooks425

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind this run a full size small. My daughter wears a 13.5- 1 and the 2 fits great with the 1/2 inch of growing room.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Niedermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Always purchase a size smaller due to wearing the boots a lot the fur lining packs down and the boot becomes much bigger.I ordered these for my 6 year old daughter last year for Christmas and they were a size 12 snug at first now they are a size bigger and fit great. But I did buy her them again this year in a size 13 to even tho her others still fit. They are her favorite boots and she wears them just about every day .
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Niece loves them
customer_reviews.text: Niece loves these boots and wears them whenever possible. She says they're "warm" and "sooooo comfortable". I'll probably buy her another pair at some point. The quality of stitching on the outer sole isn't quite that of other premium/ luxury brands (odd looking strings sewn into the stitching); quality is on par for this price point.

customer_reviews.title: Disintegrated
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Bearpaw boots before and they've been OK, but these were awful. Got them for daughter and size was fine (she is average sized 9 year old, got her a size 4). She loved them. But they split in the toe after a month. She still loved them so I tried to repair with monster glue, but it kept splitting. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Brown

customer_reviews.title: it is what he wanted and who are we to tell him he can't have vibrant and fun colored boots
customer_reviews.text: I can't really say how they fit personally as they were for my 5 yr old child. But he (yes our son has purple boots, it is what he wanted and who are we to tell him he can't have vibrant and fun colored boots! <3 ) absolutely loves his purple boots and he has always lets us know if something is even remotely uncomfortable for him. We are into minimal footwear in our house and the wintertime options are really limited for kids these "ugg" type boots have always worked well for our children and are not big clunky "can't move your feet" boots.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Ways

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sturdy-- it's all I asked for
customer_reviews.text: These are an amazing pair of comfortable boots! If you've worn uggs or anything similar before, you know that the sizing is approximately 1/2 to 1 size smaller than your usual pair. For me, being a size 5, I have to wear size 4 boots. Just don't forget to waterproof them immediately if you live in wet areas (like New England).
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Lu

customer_reviews.title: Not durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my kid. After wearing them for a month to school only, one of them has a hole on the bottom. Yes, they have such thin (or wear out that fast) rubber soles!
customer_reviews.author: amazongirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Winter Boot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent winter boot. Very little color transfer and nice and cozy for the winter. My daughter loves them. Unfortunately so did my dog. Guess I'll be buying another pair quicker than I thought. Nice boots for the price. No need to spend a fortune on the other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C. Besse

customer_reviews.title: BEARPAW does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: These boots are a great alternative to the other brand that costs significatntly more. The integrity of the boot holds up. The plush interior is warm and comfortable. The sole seems to be holding up well also. I really enjoy this brand and this particular style over the style with the side buttons. Would definitely purchase these again in the future. I have a pair, and both my daughters have a pair also.
customer_reviews.author: JRTP

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I will not order early for Christmas again
customer_reviews.text: Size was not as expected, they are too small by at least an inch if not more. Box arrived damaged but boots were not damaged. I ordered early for Christmas so my return window closed. Very disappointed. I will not order early for Christmas again....lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price, reliable seller
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. We'd had a pair in Short Black for my daughter two years ago but she finally grew out of them. The quality, however, was SO good that she was able to pass them onto my son and so I replaced hers with these in Tall Black. They came with all of the tags, proper identification and a box in good condition brand new for half the price of any retail. Really happy with the quality and hoping to pass it on again!
customer_reviews.author: Jaim

customer_reviews.title: I recommend to All Parents cause compared to ugg is very good price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter as I love it . And very warm and flexible sole. I recommend to my friends and they also bought the same. I’m buying bear paw boot for my daughter every year cause she growing.
customer_reviews.author: Tashi

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel great.
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to someone who likes or wants the UGG boot. I have both. and I like Bearpaws because they are not made of real animals like the sheep. They are warm, comfortable and I continue to give them as gifts always.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great boots: )
customer_reviews.text: Great boots :)! Like Uggs, only much nicer price! I have a pair, so these are for my girls, 12 and 7, for Christmas. They love walking around in mine in my house, lol! They are faux fur lined, so they are very warm. One could wear them all day, although they would get warm inside for any length of time, and they don't have much arch support. Other than that, they are great and my family loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sape

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is flat footed so she has to wear inserts w all her shoes. They fit her perfect, she hasn’t slipped and they keep her feet warm. Spray scotch guard or water resistant spray for wet weather...she has been wearing them as house shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Araceli F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 12 year old
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 year old daughter wanted UGGs but we didn't feel she was ready for such pricey shoes. Costco sells a sheepskin boot but she wanted a taller version so we decided to look on Amazon. These Bearpaw boots are perfect. Tall, real sheepskin and comfy without breaking the bank. She wears them all of the time and loves that the grey goes with a lot of outfits. As with most of these types of boots, they're not know for their arch support. Keep a suede brush handy so that you can brush away any mud/dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Brady- the youngest one with curls

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who wears out shoes TERRIBLY has not worn trough these in a year. We bought them a little big so she will be able to wear them again!
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 4 for my granddaughter for Christmas. The size 4 were sold out, but a representative contacted me and asked if I wanted to order a size. He stated that the boot runs a size small. I agreed and order a size up. The size fit my granddaughter perfectly. She had wanted them for school; the other grade 3 girls are wearing the shearling tall boot. The boots arrived well ahead of Christmas. I really appreciated the good communication with the company sales person, and the call to recommend a size up. The boot is nicely made, and the price was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.text: These boots last my daughter at least 2 winters. Awesome quality without paying for sticker shock! Love all the different colors they come in so my daughters have lots of options to choose from and not get the same colors to fight over, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Supplier disaster
customer_reviews.text: This supplier shipped the wrong product twice. Very frustrating! Eventually bought from Bearpaw directly. Product appears to be quality.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLIE107

customer_reviews.title: She loves them and they are super warm! They are just as warm and cozy ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for her 10th birthday. She loves them and they are super warm! They are just as warm and cozy as UGG's, but at a fraction of the price! I would definitely recommend buying 1 size larger than what your child wears now. I first bought her a size 3 (this is her current shoe size), but they just barely fit her- there was no room to grow. I had to return them (which was a breeze with free Prime returns/shipping!) and I ordered the size 4 (came to my doorstep 2 days later :-) ). Now she'll be able to get a good couple of years out of them.
customer_reviews.author: S.O.

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Terriable boots, only lasted one month, seam failure, it came apart. Other kids with same issues. Website warrenty form doesn't work either.
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boot, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this boot for my 11yr old daughter for her birthday. The boots are very nicely made, soft and warm. I gave them a couple of coats of waterproofing spray and they were ready to wear. She loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Becka

customer_reviews.title: Love these... but not this pair
customer_reviews.text: We love these boots normally, but this purchase wasn't as good as past purchases. I still gave them a 4 star as they are good quality as I have grown to expect. The only issue is that they stretched so that they became much bigger and my daughter has had to stop wearing them as she is walking over on one side.
customer_reviews.author: lottie sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw Boots are always great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting these boots for my 3 granddaughters here in Minnisota. Our winters are really long so they wear them every day from November to April. They even can be passed on to the little sister. Very comfy and cozy & a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Bobmo76

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color! I would say they are on the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are for my 8 year old daughter. Beautiful color! I would say they are on the smaller size, however, all my kids tell me after the fake fur settles down, they are fine. Her toe is closer to the top of the boot than I would like, however, going up to a size 3 would probably be way too big. I think whole sizes in boots are sometimes hard with kids in general. If you go too big, than their foot is swimming inside the boot - too wide, as well. I'm hoping this size will get her thru at least this winter season.
customer_reviews.author: TrinM

customer_reviews.title: Great boots with a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great boots with a great price! They are a little snug so I would order up a size, especially with kids growing feet! But over all have been great boots. I sprayed mine with a water resistant spray because we live where it snows and they lasted through winter! Shipping was fast!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney C

customer_reviews.title: Want ugg quality without a price that makes you say, "Ugg?"
customer_reviews.text: Great value for quality, it seems VERY close to the OG brand but a fraction of the cost. Perfect for kids in which you KNOW will either grow out of or destroy. Maybe both if you're talking about my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Martinus Riovanni

customer_reviews.title: Cozy for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves theses, they fit her great even with socks on. She likes the cozy lining best of all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bailes

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Had these boots 2 months and are falling completely apart. I buy a pair of bear paws every year, and they always last the year. Of course the return window is closed. But these boots are crap.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M. Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved to a snowy area and let me tell you that my toes felt like they were going to fall off until I got these. My feet stay warm and I don’t want to take them off ever! They fit perfect. I’m small in stature so I got a size 4 and they fit just right! For reference I wear a size 2/3 in kids converse. These boots don’t fit right or anything.
customer_reviews.author: genesis

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them! And they fit great...I wear a womens size 6.5 and I purchased a big kids size 5, they fit like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Mack's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Bearpaw is so much better than UGG brand. I have narrow feet and when I use UGG products their too big and bulky, also not as well cushioned like Bearpaw!!!! It feels like I'm walking on a sheep's wool floor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with my purchase. My daughter is a 13 so I went with her size and it fits perfect with some room will do fine for the winter. Packaged with care. Very satisfied, thank you. Will update in the weeks to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Lymaris Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Boots were very comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Boots were very comfortable and warm. They are not water proof and get soaked in the snow. My issue with the boots was that after two months the sole on one of the boots started separating from the boot. Thought they should have lasted more than two months! However, my daughter loves the boots and I may buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and nice, flexible sole!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for 7 year old daughter - she LOVES them and wears them everywhere. Very comfortable, warm, and the sole is flexible. They have held up well despite the fact that I did not weather-proof them. This was a great value and my daughter is super happy with them, which is what matters to me!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: fit perfect she normally wears a size 2
customer_reviews.text: Just have to order one size up My Granddaughter loves them,fit perfect she normally wears a size 2,I bought a size 3 after looking at all the helpful reviewers,and they're perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: suzanne Taylor

customer_reviews.title: No good quality!
customer_reviews.text: No good quality my daughter wear this boots 2 times and I have it in a box to return is sad.
customer_reviews.author: marta gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: This item was delivered right on time for my daughter to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL L CORREA

customer_reviews.title: Super boots!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, age 9, loves these boots! They just fit her and will probably out grow them this season but they are perfect right now. She loves the cozy feel on the inside and says they do keep her warm when she's playing outside for recess! Great price too compared to other places! I would recommend waterproofing them after you purchase them....otherwise the black color may turn whitish when worn out in the snow and rain....they'll fade.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: love bearpaws!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my 9 year old daughter who wears size 4 big kids. When I opened them, they looked gigantic! They fit me, and I'm a size 6 in women's. Well, I realized that a kids 4 is equivalent to a woman's 6. Overall, Fit my daughter great, comfy, even though it has slight room to grow inside. Love these shoes, don't have to pay the extra $$$ for "Uggz" as to me, they're good enough!
customer_reviews.author: syn033

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fit, my daughter actually liked them, and wears them often Good quality Advise to anyone is to buy cleaning supplies and treat boots before wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fuzzy winter boot
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy Uggs for small children who will just go outside and jump in muddy puddles a la Peppa Pig, buy these instead.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old granddaughter loves these comfy high top boots!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wears a size a 3 1/2 in shoes. I ordered a size 4 and she said they fit a little snug but after wearing them for a few hours they stretched out in the toe area making the fit perfect. She loves the soft Sherpa lining and the height of these comfy boots. She likes to wear socks with her boots, so she was happy that they stretched out allowing her to wear them. She said they were so comfy with or without wearing socks.
customer_reviews.author: Randee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for Christmas. She said they aren't as warm as Uggs but they are very nice for the price. She likes them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after one month
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased and loved bearpaw boots multiple times in the past for myself and my daughter. This last purchase was not the same. After one month of wear, the top completely came apart from the bottom. Definitely not the quality we expect from bearpaw.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter happy Nice warm boots Not expecting waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter happy Nice warm boots Not expecting waterproof , these are for cold dry days when the kids have to go out to recess Great color purple- please note - my granddaughter wears a size 1 sneaker ( just moved up from a 13 kids)and I had to get her a size 3 bear paw boot These are not super wide, we got a size 2 and had to retun it since there wasn't room for a sock. The lining is nice and thick which may account for the bigger size need.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits great.
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my wife. She's small and wears in a 5 in women's. A 4 in big kids was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: mark murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these boots. Very well made, comfy and warm! True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Havens

customer_reviews.title: Warm fashionable boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots are amazing. You want to spray them with a water resistant and stain resistant spray. They are very dark and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Aelsb22

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. She loves them and wears them all the time. They have held about great so far with Michigan winters!
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Nice real shearling boots for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are a budget conscious grandmother's answer to UGGs. Just as well made and comfy. My granddaughter has an aversion to socks and this is the answer in the winter time. This is probably her fourth or fifth pair.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Run very small- my daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Boots are warm & comfy, run very small tho, went two sizes up for my daughter who wears a size 2, returned with no problem free returns & received a size 4, fit better, perfect for cold weather, will def recommend, price is great compared to buying uggs which are so expensive, does the same job & look similar!!! Brought other school stuff with money saved!!! Love love love
customer_reviews.author: M.C 162

customer_reviews.title: Well made and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots for the price. Even though I can afford to, I am hesitant to buy the more expensive brand of this type boot for a growing girl. These are very nice and my 11 year old daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Goosey gal

customer_reviews.title: Love Bearpaw's! We have bought several through the years
customer_reviews.text: Love Bearpaw's! We have bought several through the years. My 10 year old needed a new pair but sizing is difficult because she is kind of between girls and womens sizing. She wanted to try the kids sizing though so the calf wouldn't be huge on her, as she has skinny little legs. She takes about a 7 womens and 5/6 kids, and the kids size 5 fit her great!
customer_reviews.author: laurstelli

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Had mixed reviews (seemed to be mostly size issues) so I was a little nervous. But these boots fit true to size on my 8yr old and even after a couple months of wear they are holding up great. I will be buying another pair next season.
customer_reviews.author: H.M.

customer_reviews.title: These Bear Paw boots are just as nice, if not nicer than some of the more ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has an obsession with boots -- namely "uggs." I have a hard time spending over $100+ for a single pair of boots, especially for a small child. My children are especially hard on their shoes, and grow out of very quickly. These Bear Paw boots are just as nice, if not nicer than some of the more expensive name brand boots on the market. The quality is superb. I have absolutely no complaints. We purchased the gray color, and they look even better in person than the photo. I am very, very happy with this purchase. And for the price, I can buy my daughter a pair in every color. That's what I call a Win!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Just Like Mommies
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love our Bearpaws. I got a pair last year and wear them 24/7. Super comfy and warm. So as soon as I saw them in mini me's size u knew she had to have them. She also loves how comfortable and warm they are. This is a great substitution for some of the much more expensive brands. Great price in comparison but not lacking in quality. Other reviews have said to size up or down. I got my exact size and they are perfect. For my daughter I sized up, hoping to get two seasons out of them and they are not too huge.
customer_reviews.author: A&BMom

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw's Rubber Sole vs Foam Sole
customer_reviews.text: We prefer Bearpaw boots because of the RUBBER SOLE Vs. the FOAM SOLE that I see on other popular company's boots. A foam sole, is comparable to a flip flop sole and is very unsafe especially when wet. I've got more peace of mind knowing that my daughter is safer running and playing in them, especially at school. The children's sizes tend to run small, so we go up a size and buy thick, fun patterned tights and knee high socks. The boots are very well constructed and made with high quality leathers and shearling so combined with the sizing up, she's able to wear them for a very long time! Always size up with Bearpaw....
customer_reviews.author: Zi

customer_reviews.title: My daughter wanted uggs like mine but we didn't want to spend 180
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted uggs like mine but we didn't want to spend 180.00 for boots she would want to constantly wear and tear up. The quaility of these are awesome the feel and look very similar to my uggs but for a fraction of the cost! They are actual sheep skin as well! We bought them in December she wears them alot and they still look new!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots were purchased for my granddaughter who is a swimmer and needed the warmth coming out of the pool at swimmeets. They are a bit shorter than we expected and they do run small. We ordered the size accordingly because of the reviews so they fit perfectly. At first she was a little disappointed because of the height but is now quite happy with them. An affordable alternative to UGGS.
customer_reviews.author: Cassiesmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Value/ never mind
customer_reviews.text: Had these boots for 3 MONTHS and they literally FELL APART while I was walking. Such a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Marve

customer_reviews.title: That they were perfyfoe the winter
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots I bought them for my granddaughter. She’s 5 years old and she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Mendez

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Just like I wanted for my daughter... shipping was delayed a little but I’m guessing because of the holidays so I’m not worried about it! Love the boots!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the fell apart in a few weeks! They did not hold up. Boot were warm and comfortable- we went 1/2 size up bc my daughter's feet are wide. I don't see an easy way to contact the seller or store! I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacci

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made shoes
customer_reviews.text: After one wear the left boot already split at the toe. They were worn less than two hours. Would not recommend these to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Matthh

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my granddaughter and she absolutely loves them!
customer_reviews.author: jimjam

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and are well made. My daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Milburn

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter and she loves them. They are warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Yiayia

customer_reviews.title: My daughter approves
customer_reviews.text: Cozy and well made. I don't know why anyone would buy Uggs when these are well made, look good, and more affordably priced. The only "problem" is that they have so much cozy faux fur on the inside is that sometimes my daughter's feet get too hot (but that's not a bad problem to have in the Northeast).
customer_reviews.author: Emmobee

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my 6yo daughter, and she just loves them! It’s her favorite to go boots. Comfy and warm enough for the Wisconsin winters!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca B...

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these boots.
customer_reviews.text: My almost 7 year old granddaughter loves her boots, she even wears them on PE days. They fit her well with a little room for growth, which is what we wanted. We wanted these to last through the winter. My husband bought and used the water repellent spray that the boot instructions recommend and made sure it was dry before she started wearing them. They keep her feet warm and don't make her feet sweat, like other boots. We're very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hromada

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: You can literally style these boots with anything ! My 8 year old loves them !
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but girls size run small
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I owned a pair in black and wore them to pieces (they didn't actually fall apart, but they weren't as pretty as I wore them for years). I purchased these for my daughter in black and purple. She loves them as well. They do run small in the youth/girls size. My daughter is a size 12/13 in shoes depending on they run. I read previous reviews on these boots & I ordered a size 1 due to reviews stating they ran small for girls. While they fit perfectly I think we could've ordered a size 2 with room to go. Will order these again- We are wanting to get pink & possibly brown.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I just can justify spending a fortune on Uggs so felt that these would be a fair substitute. Kids outgrow their boots so fast that Uggs are a complete waste of my hard earned money! Plus, these keep their feet as warm as the other brand! The money saved was used to buy her other things she wanted for her birthday so she's happy too!
customer_reviews.author: Q. Vu

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product was great! It keeps my feet warm when it’s cold and it’s very comfortable, highly recommend this boot
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every time my daughter grows out of them. Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: kiristen biggerstaff

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product zero stars I would. My daughter wore these for a month before the sole completely separated from the shoe. Contacted The Kiks & they did nothing but let me know the window was over. POS product, these aren’t authentic Bearpaw boots.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. No quality or fit issues, what-so-ever. Bought for eight year old who is tough on shoes. No brainer to choose these over Uggs, unless you like throwing your money in your fireplace and burning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and warm. Daughter wears them almost everyday. Only problem is that they don’t seem to have a very long life.
customer_reviews.author: Deserae Manning

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable, sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the boots. They are now all covered in mud!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer v

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Service was good
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my granddaughter she loves them. All she wears for boots
customer_reviews.author: lucille partridge

customer_reviews.title: Quality wise they are great and perfect for a kid since ugg are so ...
customer_reviews.text: Too small I even measured before I ordered but they don't quite fit. Wish I could just do an exchange. Quality wise they are great and perfect for a kid since ugg are so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Ecflorer

product_meta.title: BEARPAW Emma Tall Youth Boot
product_meta.description:
Give her a grown-up look with this boot from BEARPAW. The Emma's smooth suede upper contains a comfy lining that keeps her foot warm and dry. The flexible, non-marking rubber sole offers your little one improved traction on wet surfaces.

Bearpaw Footwear is made for comfort with contemporary style. Our footwear is made from quality materials that provide an organic beauty that's wearable year round.
